title: allow fileaccess to computer files with user's permission
body: allow all those folders which are accessible by a filepicker to be accesed directly by code or by using path to a specific file in computer's hard drive. or you can say that once a user had selected some files with filepicker these files should be able to be used in future run of app without need of filepicker, and 1000 should not be a limit, user can just allow the app to access specific folders of the computer, so we will not need a "futureaccesslist" api .

comments.body:
when opening a file by file-Extension (file type association) then you the app NEED file permission to that file
